mapper.select: select LB_D_no, SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(name,'.') name from library_dir where parent_no != 0 and ((select real_ver from JDK_version where add_ver = JDK_VER_no) <= #{ver} and remove_ver = 0 or #{ver} < (select real_ver from JDK_version where remove_ver = JDK_VER_no)) start with parent_no = 0 connect by prior LB_D_no = parent_no order by name

select lb_d_no,name,addv.real_ver add_ver,remove_ver from library_dir lb inner join JDK_version addv on lb.add_ver = addv.jdk_ver_no left join JDK_version removev on lb.remove_ver = removev.jdk_ver_no where parent_no = #{parent_no} and (addv.real_ver <= #{ver} and remove_ver = 0 or #{ver} < removev.real_ver) order by name
